subject: Re: [junit] test cases for inputs from file
msgSnippet: Yes, but they don t appear to create directories, which was what I needed. *********** REPLY SEPARATOR  *********** ... time.  J. B. Rainsberger,
messageBody:
Yes, but they don't appear to create directories, which was what I
needed.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-09-08 at 13:39 Timothy Wall wrote:

>generators work pretty well for getting a uniquely-built file every
time.
